briefTitle: A Trial to Compare American Heart Association (AHA) and Simple (SIM)Method to Give Adenosine to Treat Supra-ventricular Tachycardia (SVT)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Svt
* normal blood pressure
* normal mentation
* Give consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* recent coffee
* Allergy to adenosine
* Asthma
* cardiac operations

outcomeMeasures.title: The Number of Patients With First Dose Successful Termination of the Supraventricular Tachycardia to a Sinus Rhythm of Less Than 140 With the AHA Versus a Simplified Method of Adenosine Administration
outcomeMeasures.description: The primary outcome is the rhythm of conversion to a sinus rhythm less than 140 beat per minute.
